author: brickfilmer101
title: Help is on the way!
review: This is a cool set for begginers. This set has a nice set age. I don't think I would get it because its not really worth buying. It's just this really small car and there is no room for a patient. Its just a normal car.

author: hustla187
title: Looks Like a Medical Go-Kart
review: This is a really an odd looking car or it's a go cart with sirens. The go-cart doesn't really go into a set that has a doctor minifig unless there's a go-cart track and alot of go-carts included. However, I do like the fact that these would be great for spare parts. Overall, this needs work.

author: Shadow_Crawler
title: Medic Car
review:
A little set to complete your little village clinic.

Box/Instructions

No box, just polybag. The instructions is just a piece of paper. Don't expect any booklet.

Parts

Ordinary 'hospital' parts, like the 1x1 tile with the meter on top, etc.

Minifigures

1 medic minifigure, with a medic buttoned coat, white trousers, eyeglasses, way-too-big hat, and a black suitcase.

The build

Very easy and simple, 4 minutes at most.

The completed model

Really simple (maybe even too simple). Just a car and a medic. What you see at the polybag is what you got, no more.

Summary

Certainly doesn't fit in any modern urban hosiptal (a full-fledged ambulance will do the job), maybe this small medic car will fit in a village clinic, or wherever there's a off-road terrain.

author: sikennedy
title: Really? a medical car?
review: Ok so its a nice wee car and given i got it for 65p with the newspaper promo, you cant complain about value for money. But its not really anything like any medic car i have seen before, other than the ones you see at football or rugby matches that have a stretcher to carry the injured player off. it reminds me more of the little carts you see around airports or railway stations, or a golf cart. I suppose you could add 2 seats on the back by extending it somehow and use it as a passenger transport or golf cart. So value for money it gets 5*, design as a medic car 1*, parts 3*, minifig 3*

author: Gary_Bricks
title: Only Hospital set I have
review:
This is the only Lego City set I have in the Hospital series. I like the minifigure very much. It comes with a rare black suitcase. The vehicle has a 7*4 base like the  3177 Small Car set. Has a cool white 'racers mudguard' at the front and a normal mudguard at the back. Has some strange, pathetically built equipment at the back.

Over all 3 3/4 out of 5
